pages.text: Chrysopoeia is a great work, allowing you to transform items (held in your off-hand) into other items. Generally speaking, most recipes are lossy, in that it takes more of the original item to obtain a single result.$(br2)$(warning) As this guide book is unable to list all recipes, please see $(uses:roots:spell_chrysopoeia)the uses of 'Spell: Chrysopoeia' in JEI$() for a complete listing.
